abstract: Ambitious attempts to overhaul the entire tax code often founder on small exceptions made, an economist writes.
snippet: Ambitious attempts to overhaul the entire tax code often founder on small exceptions made, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Bruce Bartlett held senior policy roles in the Reagan and George H.W. Bush administrations and served on the staffs of Representatives Jack Kemp and Ron Paul. He is the author of the forthcoming book "The Benefit and the Burden."

headline.main: The Tax Reform Act of 1986: Should We Do It Again?
